welcome_message_title: Welcome to El Talar de Pacheco
welcome_message_body: Welcome to El Talar de Pacheco! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that El Talar de Pacheco has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Ezeiza Ministro Pistarini Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
